name: name
The name of the NextCloud service: The name of the NextCloud service
The description of the NextCloud service: The description of the NextCloud service
Choose a loadbalancer service with EIP t: Choose a loadbalancer service with EIP to use (When you create loadbalancer, you need to select the Internet type. Loadbalancer listener need to enable Session Sticky and set Timeout to 86400s. Listener protocol could be http and https.)
Number of nodes for the cluster to creat: Number of nodes for the cluster to create
The instance type for the cluster to run: The instance type for the cluster to run, such as high performance, high performance plus
Provide the zone of bucket to use: Provide the zone of bucket to use
Provide the bucket name to use: Provide the bucket name to use
Provide the access address of this servi: Provide the access address of this service to use, such as https://abc.xyz or http://1.2.3.4 . (You can use the loadbalancer's eip, if you use domain name, you need to configure A record to the load balancer bound EIP at the domain name resolver.)
The volume size for each cluster's tmp w: The volume size for each cluster's tmp which used as upload cache
The volume size for mysql data: The volume size for mysql data
